attributes.action: Give pension owners share voting rights
attributes.additional_details: All of us pension payers currently have no say over the companies we OWN via our monthly payments.  Pensions account for a massive amount of shares and at the moment NO rights are given to the people who actually own these companies.  It’s about time that that option was taken away from companies so they are accountable to us their owners not the institutional investors who have far more power than their ownership should allow.
